manzils.text: 50|1|kahp. (Napiye!) Mikka melana inta kur'an mitu cattiyamaka! (Nir nam'mal anuppappatta tutartan)

50|2|ayinum, avarkalukku accamutti eccarikkai ceyyum oruvar (-muham'matakiya nir) avarkalil irunte (iraittutaraka) avarkalitam vantataip parri accariyappattu, innirakarippavarkal ‘‘itu mika arputamana visayamenru'' kurukinranar
50|3|(melum, ‘‘ittutar kurukinrapati) nam irantu ukki mannakap ponatan pinnara (uyirkotuttu mitkappatuvom?) Ivvaru miluvatu veku turam. (Atu nikalappovatillai'' enrum kurukinranar)

50|4|(Maranitta)pin avarkalin tekattai man tinru alittuk kontiruppatai niccayamaka nam arivom. (Eninum, nam virumpiya nerattil maranitta avarkalai uyir kotuttu eluppivituvom.) Melum, (avarkalin ceyalkalaip parriya) patukakkappatta pativup puttakam nam'mitattil irukkiratu. (Atil ovvonrum varaiyappattullatu)
50|5|ivvariruntum avarkalitam vanta unmaiyana (vetat)tai avarkal poyyakki verum kulappattirkullaki vittanar

50|6|tankalukku melirukkum vanattai avarkal kavanittup parkkavillaiya? Nam atai evvaru oru kattukkoppaka amaittu, atai (natcattirankalaik kontu) alankaramakki vaittirukkirom. Atil evvita vetippukalum illai. (Ottai utaicalum illai)
50|7|melum, name pumiyai virittu, atil urutiyana malaikalaiyum amaittu alakana purpuntukal anaittaiyum (an, pen konta) joti jotiyaka mulaippittom
50|8|(itu) nam'mai nokki nirkum ella atiyarkalukkum nalla upatecankalakavum oru patippinaiyakavum (irukkiratu)
50|9|mekattiliruntu mika pakkiyamulla malaiyai nam poliyac ceytu, ataikkontu pala colaikalaiyum (vivacayikal) aruvatai ceyyum taniya manikalaiyum urpatti ceykirom
50|10|atukkatukkay (kanikal) nirainta kulaikalaiyutaiya nintu valarum pericca marankalaiyum (mulaippikkac ceytom)
50|11|atai (nam) atiyarkalukku unavakki, avarraikkontu iranta pumiyai nam uyirppikkirom. Ivvare (maranittavarkal camatikalil iruntu) veliyakuvatum erpatum
50|12|(ivarraiyellam) ivarkalukku munnar irunta nuhvutaiya makkalum, ras'su (akalu)taiya makkalum, samut ennum makkalum poyyakkinar
50|13|Atu ennum makkalum, hpir'avnum, luttutaiya cakotararkalum (poyyakkinar)
50|14|melum, toppil vacittavarkalum, ‘tuppa'u' ennum makkalum (poyyakkinar). Ivarkal ovvoruvarum (enatu) tutarkalaip poyyakkinar. Akave, (avarkalai alippomenra) enatu vakku purttiyayirru

50|15|(pataippukal anaittaiyum) mutalmurai pataittatil nam kalaittu vittoma? (Ivarkalai marumurai pataippatu namakkuc ciramamenak kuruvatarku!) Eninum, (mintum ivarkalai) putitakap pataikkum visayattil ivarkal cantekattil irukkinranar
50|16|niccayamaka namtan manitanai (mutan mutalakavum) pataittom. Avan manatil utikkum ennattaiyum nam arivom. Pitariyilulla iratta narampaivita nam avanukku mika camipamakave irukkirom
50|17|valatu purattil oruvarum, itatu purattil oruvarumaka iruvar (avan ceyyum ceyalaik) kurippetuttuk kontirukkinranar
50|18|(manitan) etaik kuriyapotilum atai elutak kattuk kontirukkum oruvar avanitam illamalillai. (Avan vayiliruntu purappatum ovvoru varttaiyum utanukkutan patiyappatukiratu)
50|19|maranattin ciramam meyyakave vantuvitum camayattil (avanai nokki) ‘‘ni tappivitak karutiyatu itutan'' (enru kurappatum)
50|20|ekkalam utappattal (avanai nokki ‘‘unakkup) payamuruttappattu vanta (vicaranai) nal ito (vantuvittatu)'' enru kurappatum
50|21|(annalil) ovvoru atmavaiyum, atan catciyutan oruvar ottik kontu varuvar

50|22|Avanai nokki, ‘‘niccayamaka ni itaip parrik kavalaiyarriruntay. Un parvaiyai maraittuk kontirunta tiraiyai unnai vittum nam nikki vittom. Inraiya tinam un parvai kurmaiyayirukkiratu. (Akave, ni maruttuk kontiruntatai un kan tirantu par'' enru kurappatum)
50|23|(catci kura) avanutan vantavar ‘‘ito (avanutaiya pativetu, avanutaiya natavatikkaiyin kurippu) ennitam (tayaraka) irukkiratu'' enru kuruvar
50|24|(utane iru kavalarkalai nokki) ‘‘nirakarittuk kontirunta (saittanaiyum) ovvoru vampanaiyum narakattil tallunkal'' (enru kurappatum)
50|25|(‘‘avan) nanmaiyana kariyankalait tatuttukkontu, (innalaic) cantekittu varampu mirikkontumiruntan'' enrum
50|26|‘‘ivan allahvutan veroru katavulai erpatuttinan enrum, akave, ninkaliruvarum ivanaik kotiya vetanaiyil pottuvitunkal'' (enrum kurappatum)

50|27|(accamayam) ivanutaiya inai piriyata cinekitan (aka irunta saittan iraivanai nokki,) ‘‘en iraivane! Nan ivanai valiketukkavillai. Tanakave avan veku turamana valikettil cenruvittan'' enru kuruvan
50|28|(akave, iraivan avarkalai nokki,) ‘‘en munpaka ninkal tarkkittuk kontirukka ventam. Erkanave (itaip parri) unkalukku (eccarittup) payamuruttiyirunten
50|29|en kattalai marrappatuvatillai; nan en atiyarkalukku arave aniyayam ceypavanalla'' enrum kuruvan
50|30|annalil narakattai nokki, ‘‘un vayiru niraintuvittata?'' Enru nam ketpom. Atarku atu ‘‘innum etum irukkirata?'' Enru ketkum
50|31|(annalil) iraiyaccamutaiyavarkalukku corkkam mikka camipamakak kontu varappatum
50|32|‘‘Itutan unkalukku vakkalikkappattatu'' (enrum,) ‘‘eppolutum iraivanaiye nokki iruntu (iraivanutaiya kattalaikalaip) peni natantu konta anaivarukkum itu kitaikkum'' (enrum)
50|33|evarkal, maraivilum rahmanukkup payantu natantu (rahmanaiye murrilum) nokkiya manatutan varukirarkalo
50|34|(avarkalai nokki,) ‘‘iterram perru ninkal itil nulaintu vitunkal. Itu nirantaramana nalakum'' (enrum kurappatum)
50|35|avarkal virumpiyatellam atil avarkalukkuk kitaikkum. Melum, nam'mitamiruntu (avarkal ketkatatum innum) atikamakak kotukkappatum

50|36|ivarkalukku munnar ettanaiyo kuttattarai nam alittirukkirom. Avarkal ivarkalaivita mika palacalikalaka iruntarkal. Avarkal (tappittukkolla) pala tecankalil currit tirintarkal. (Appotu avarkalukku) tappa itam kitaittata? (Illai, kitaikkamal alintu vittanar)
50|37|evarukku (paricuttamana) ullamiruntu, ormaippatana manatutan cevicaykkiraro, avarukku niccayamaka itil nalla patippinai irukkiratu
50|38|niccayamaka namtan vanankalaiyum, pumiyaiyum atarku mattiyil ullavarraiyum are natkalil pataittom. Atanal namakku oru kalaippum (corvum) erpattu vitavillai

50|39|(napiye!) Avarkal (um'maik kurai) kuruvataip parri (kavalaippatatir;) nir porumaiyaka ataic cakittuk kontiruntu, curiya utayattirkum, atu maraivatarkum munnar umatu iraivanaip pukalntu tuti ceytuvaruviraka
50|40|iravil oru pakattilum, ovvoru tolukaikkup pinnarum avanait tuti ceyviraka
50|41|(napiye!) Nir cevimatuttuk ketpiraka. (Camatikalukku) camipamana itattiliruntu (kontu ‘‘maranittavarkale! Elumpunkal'' enru) alaippavar alaikkum nalil
50|42|(Vanavarkal avarkalai viratti ottum) perum captattai meyyakave avarkal annalil ketparkal. Atutan (maranittavarkal camatiyiliruntu) velippatum nal
50|43|niccayamaka namtan uyirppikkirom; namtan maranikkac ceykirom; nam'mitame anaivarum varaventiyatirukkiratu

50|44|(maranittavarkalai mutikkontirukkum) pumi veku tiviramaka (vetittu) avarkalai vittu vilakum nalai (ninaivu kuruviraka). Atutan (vicaranaikkaka anaivaraiyum) onru cerkkum nal. I(vvaru ceyva)tu namakku mikka elitanate
50|45|(napiye! Um'maip parri) avarkal kuruvatai nam nankarivom. Nir avarkalai nirppantikkakkutiyavaralla. Enatu vetanaiyaip payappatupavarkalukku inta kur'anaik kontu nir nallupatecam ceyviraka
51|1|(katal nirai aviyakkic citaratikkum) curavalikal mitum
51|2|(anta niraviyai) cumantu cellum mekankal mitum
51|3|(pala pakattirku atai) elitaka(t tankic) cellum mekankal mitum
51|4|atai (pumiyin pala pakankalil) malaiyaka pirittuvitum vanavarkal mitum cattiyamaka
51|5|(ceyalukkut takka kuli kotukkappatumenru) unkalukku alikkappatta vakkuruti niccayamaka unmaiyanate
51|6|niccayamaka (ceyalkalukkuriya) kuli kotukkappatte tirum
51|7|(natcattirankalin) alakiya pataikalutaiya vanattin mitu cattiyamaka
51|8|niccayamaka ninkal (cattiyattirku) muranakap pecuvatiltan nilaittu vittirkal
51|9|(erkanave, allahvutaiya vitiyinpati) tiruppappattavane cattiyattai vittum tiruppappatuvan
51|10|poy colpavarkal alinte povar
51|11|avarkal tankal matamaiyal (marumaiyaiye) marantuvittanar
51|12|avarkal, ‘‘kuli kotukkum nal eppolutu varum?'' Enru (parikacamakak) ketkinranar
51|13|Annalil avarkal, neruppil pocukki vetanai ceyyappatuvarkal
51|14|(avarkalai nokki) ‘‘unkal vetanaiyai cuvaittup parunkal. Ninkal (eppolutu varumenru) avacarappattuk kontiruntirkalo atu itutan'' (enrum kurappatum)
51|15|niccayamaka iraiyaccamutaiyavarkal corkkankalilum, niraruvikalukku arukilum irupparkal
51|16|avarkal tankal iraivan kotuppatai(t tiruptiyutan) perruk kolvarkal. Niccayamaka avarkal itarku munnar nanmai ceypavarkalakave iruntarkal
51|17|avarkal iravil veku corpa (nera)me nittirai ceypavarkalaka iruntanar
51|18|avarkal vitiyarkalai nerattil (eluntu tankal iraivanai vananki, avanitam pava) mannippuk koruvarkal
51|19|avarkalutaiya porulkalil, (vay tirantu) yacakam ketpavarkalukkum, (ketkata) variyavarkalukkum pakamuntu. (Anaivarukkum avarkal tanam ceyvarkal)
51|20|uruti(yaka nampikkai) kontavarkalukkup pumiyil pala attatcikal irukkinrana
51|21|unkalukku ullakavum (pala attatcikal irukkinrana. Avarrai) ninkal alntu kavanittup parkka ventama
51|22|unkalukku vakkalikkappattavaiyum unkal unavum vanattil tan irukkinrana
51|23|vanam, pumiyin iraivan mitu cattiyamaka! Niccayamaka itu, (unkal varttaikalai) ninkaltan kurukirirkal enpatil cantekamillatiruppataip pol (inta kur'anil ulla anaittum) unmaiyanatakum
51|24|(napiye!) Iprahimutaiya mikka kanniyamulla viruntinarkalin visayam umakku ettiyirukkirata

51|25|Avarkal avaritam vantapotu (avarai nokki “umakku) salam (iterram) untavataka!'' Enru kurinarkal. Atarku (iprahim, “unkalukkum) salam (iterram) untavataka!'' Enru kuri, (ivarkal nam) ariyata makkalaka irukkinranare! (Enru tan manattil enninar)
51|26|piraku, viraivakat tan vittinul cenru koluttatoru kanruvin (poritta) mamicattaik kontuvantar
51|27|atai avarkal mun vaittar. (Anal, atai avarkal pucikkavillai. Atalal, avarkalai nokki) ‘‘ninkal pucikka mattirkala?'' Enru kettar

51|28|(iruppinum, avarkal pucikkamaliruppataik kanta) avar, avarkalaip parri payantar. (Itai arinta avarkal ‘‘iprahime!) Payappatatir'' enru kuri, (is'hak ennum) mikka nanamulla makanai avarukku narceyti kurinarkal
51|29|(itaic ceviyurra) avarutaiya manaivi (sara) kuccalutan avarkal munvantu, tan mukattil araintukontu ‘‘(nano) tallatiya kilavi; atilum malati. (Evvitam enakkuk kulantai pirakkum?)'' Enru kurinar
51|30|atarkavarkal, ‘‘ivvare, umatu iraivan kurukiran. Niccayamaka avantan mika nanamullavan, anaittaiyum nankarintavan avan'' enrarkal
51|31|(pinnar iprahim vanavarkalai nokki) ‘‘tutarkale! Unkal kariyamenna? (Etarkaka ninkal inku vantirkal?)'' Enru kettar
51|32|atarkavarkal ‘‘niccayamaka nankal (perum) kurravalikalana (lut napiyin) makkalitam anuppappattullom'' enru kurinar
51|33|‘‘nankal, avarkal mitu kali mannal ceyta (cutta) karkalai erivatarkaka (anuppappattullom)
51|34|‘‘(avai) umatu iraivanitam varampu miriyavarkalukkena (peyarkal elutappattu) ataiyalamitappattavaiyakum
51|35|Akave, (avarkal alivatarku munnatakave avvuril irunta) nampikkai kontavarkalai atiliruntu nam velippatutti vittom
51|36|eninum, atil (luttutaiya) oru vittarait tavira, nampikkai konta oruvaraiyum nankal kanavillai
51|37|tunpuruttum vetanaiyai payappatukiravarkalukku atil oru patippinaiyai vittu vaittom
51|38|musavutaiya (carittirat)tilum (oru patippinai) irukkiratu. Telivana attatcikalutan avarai hpir'avnitam nam anuppiya camayattil
51|39|avan valuvana tan atciyin karvattal avaraip purakkanittu, ‘‘ivaroru cuniyakkarar; allatu paittiyakkarar'' enru kurinan
51|40|atalal, avanaiyum avanutaiya pataikalaiyum nam pitittuk katalil erintuvittom. Avan enrenrume nintanaikkullaki vittan
51|41|‘atu' ennum makkalilum (oru patippinaiyuntu). Avarkal mitu nam (nacakaramana) malattuk karrai anuppiya camayattil
51|42|atu pattataiyellam tuciya(kkip parakkati)kkamal vitavillai
51|43|‘samutu' ennum makkalilum (oru patippinaiyuntu). ‘‘Ninkal oru kalam varai cukamaka valntirunkal'' enru avarkalukkuk kurappattatarku
51|44|avarkal tankal iraivanin kattalaiyai mirinarkal. Akave, avarkal (tankalai alikka vanta mekattaip) parttuk kontirukkum polute avarkalai or iti mulakkam pitittuk kontatu
51|45|akave, avarkal nirkavum mutiyavillai. (Utkaravum mutiyavillai;) nam'mitam palivankavum mutiyavillai. (Iruntavare alintu vittanar)
51|46|itarku munnar (irunta) nuhutaiya makkalaiyum (alittu vittom). Niccayamaka avarkalum pavam ceyyum makkalakave iruntanar
51|47|(Evarutaiya utaviyuminri) nam caktiyaik konte vanattai amaittom. Niccayamaka nam (atai avarkalin arivirkellam ettatavaru) mikka vicalamakkiyum vaittirukkirom
51|48|pumiyai nam (vicalamaka) virittom. Virippavarkalilellam mikka melana vitattil virippavar name
51|49|ovvoru vastukkalaiyum (an, pen konta) joti jotiyakave nam pataittirukkirom. (Itaikkontu) ninkal nallunarcci peruvirkalaka
51|50|akave, (pavattiliruntu vilaki) allahvin pakkam veku tiviramaka ninkal viraintu cellunkal. Niccayamaka nan avanaip parri unkalukkup pakirankamakave accamutti eccarikkai ceykiren
51|51|allahvutan vanakkattirkuriya veroru iraivanai akkatirkal. Niccayamaka nan, avanitamiruntu unkalukku (itaip parriyum) pakirankamaka accamutti eccarikkai ceypavaraka irukkiren
51|52|ivvare ivarkalukku munniruntavarkalum, avarkalitam entat tutar vantapotilum, avarai cuniyakkarar allatu paittiyakkarar enru kuramalirukkavillai

51|53|(ivvaru kurumpatiye) avarkal tankalukkul (paramparai paramparaiyaka) oruvarukkoruvar upatecam ceytu vantanar polum! Illai, avarkal (iyarkaiyileye ivvaru kurak kutiya) aniyayakkara makkalaka iruntanar
51|54|(napiye!) Nir avarkalaip purakkanittu vituviraka. (Avarkal nirakarippataip parri) nir nintikkappata mattir
51|55|(napiye!) Nir nallupatecam ceyviraka. Niccayamaka nallupatecam nampikkaiyalarkalukkup payanalikkum
51|56|jinkalaiyum, manitarkalaiyum (avarkal ennai arintu) ennai vanankuvatarke tavira (veretarkakavum) nan pataikkavillai
51|57|Avarkalitattil nan oru porulaiyum ketkavillai. Avarkal enakku unavu kotuttuk kontirukkumarum nan koravillai. (Akave)
51|58|(napiye! Nir kuruviraka:) Niccayamaka allahtan anaivarukkum unavalippavanum, acaikka mutiyata palacaliyumavan

51|59|ivvakkiramakkararkalin nanparkalukku irunta (nanmai, timaiyai alakkakkutiya) alavup patikalaip polave, niccayamaka ivarkalukkum alavup patikaluntu. (Avai niraintatum vetanaiyaik kontu ivarkalaip pitittuk kolvom.) Atalal, avarkal avacarappata ventam
51|60|(vicaranaikkaka pavikalukku) vakkalikkappatta nalil innirakarippavarkalukkuk ketutan
52|1|tur (ennum) malaiyin mitu cattiyamaka
52|2|viritta ettil vari variyaka elutappatta veta nulin mitu cattiyamaka
52|3|viritta ettil vari variyaka elutappatta veta nulin mitu cattiyamaka
52|4|paittul mahmur (ennum alayattin) mitu cattiyamaka
52|5|uyarnta mukattin mitu cattiyamaka
52|6|(totarntu) alaikal motik kontirukkum camuttirattin mitu cattiyamaka
52|7|(napiye!) Niccayamaka umatu iraivanin vetanai (avarkalukku) vante tirum
52|8|evaralum atait tatukka mutiyatu
52|9|vanamum tutitutittuk kumurum nalil
52|10|malaikal (peyarntu) parantotum (nalil)
52|11|(napiye! Um'maip) poyyakkum ivarkalukku annalil ketutan
52|12|avarkal (vin vitantavatattil) mulki vilaiyatikkontu irukkinranar
52|13|avarkal narakattin pakkam (atittu) verutti ottappatum nalil
52|14|(avarkalai nokki) ‘‘ninkal poyyakkik kontirunta naraka neruppu itutan'' enru kurappatum
52|15|itu verum cuniyamtana? Allatu, itai ninkal (unkal kannal) parkkavillaiya

52|16|Atil nulaintu vitunkal. (Atan vetanaiyaip poruttuc) cakittuk kontirunkal; allatu cakikkatirunkal. (Irantum) unkalukkuc camame! (Vetanaiyil or anuvalavum kuraiyatu.) Ninkal ceytavarrukkuriya kulitan unkalukkuk kotukkappatum
52|17|allahvukkup payantu natantavarkal niccayamaka corkkankalilum inpattilum irupparkal
52|18|tankal iraivan tankalukku alittiruppavarraip parriyum, naraka vetanaiyiliruntu tankalait tankal iraivan patukattuk kontataip parriyum makilcci ataintavarkalaka irupparkal
52|19|(avarkalai nokki) ‘‘ninkal ceyta nanmaikalin karanamaka (itil ullavarrai) mikka taralamakap pucittuk kontum, parukik kontum irunkal'' (enrum kurappatum)
52|20|varicaiyakap potappatta kattilkalin mitu cayn(tu patut)tavarkalaka iruppar. Nam avarkalukku (‘hurulin' ennum) kannalakika(lakiya kanni)kalai tirumanam ceytu vaippom

52|21|enta nampikkaiyalarkalin cantatikal, tankal perrorkalaip pinparri nampikkai kolkirarkalo (antac cantatikalin nanmaikal kuraivaka iruntum avarkalin perrorkal tiruptiyataiyum poruttu) avarkalutaiya cantatikalaiyum avarkalutan (corkkattil) certtuvituvom. Itanal avarkalutaiya perrorkalin nanmaikalil etaiyum nam kuraittuvita mattom. Ovvoru manitanum, tan ceyta ceyalukkup pinaiyaka irukkiran
52|22|avarkal virumpiya (parpala vakai) kanivarkkankalaiyum, mamicankalaiyum avarkalukku (naltorum) nam (eralamakak) kotuttu varuvom
52|23|oruvarutaiya kinnattai marroruvar (kalippal) pitunkik kolvar. (Atanal) manattankalo allatu mariyataikkuraivo erpatatu
52|24|Avarkalaic curri (avarkalukkup pani ceyya enneramum) ciruvarkal palar curri varuvarkal. Avarkal patinta muttukkalaip pol (pirakacamaka) irupparkal
52|25|avarkalil oruvar marroruvarai nokki (amarntu kontu makilcciyaka) uraiyatuvarkal
52|26|‘‘itarku munnar, nam nam kutumpattaip parri (avarkalutaiya kati ennavakumo enru) meyyakave payantukonte iruntom
52|27|ayinum, allah nam'mitu arul purintu kotiya vetanaiyiliruntu nam'mai(yum nam kutumpattinaraiyum) kapparrinan
52|28|itarku munnar (vetanaiyiliruntu nam'mai kakkumpati) meyyakave nam avanitam pirarttanai ceytukontu iruntom. Meyyakave avantan nanmai ceypavan, peranputaiyavan avan'' enru kuruvarkal
52|29|(napiye!) (Nirakarippavarkalukku vetanaiyai) napakamuttik konte iruppiraka. Umatu iraivanin arulal nir kuri colpavarumalla; paittiyakkararumalla
52|30|(um'maip parri) avarkal (nir) oru kavinartan enru kurukinranara? (Ikkurrukkut tantanaiyaka avarkal mitu campavikkakkutiya cotanaiyin) kalaccakkarattai etirparttiruppom
52|31|akave (avarkalai nokki, atai) ‘‘ninkalum etirparttirunkal. (Enna natakkiratu enpatai) niccayamaka nanum unkalutan etirparttirukkiren'' enru kuruviraka
52|32|(napiye! Um'mai kurikarar enrum, paittiyakkarar enrum kurumpati) avarkalutaiya arivutan avarkalait tuntukirata? Allatu (iyarkaiyakave) avarkal visamikaltana
52|33|allatu (nam napiyakiya) ivar poyyakave ataik karpanai ceytu kontarenru avarkal kurukinranara? Maraka (manamurantakave) itai avarkal nampikkai kolvatillai
